name: wdt-model-builder
displayName: WebLogic Server Deploy Tooling (WDT) Model Builder
description: GUI for managing model files used with the WebLogic Server Deploy Tooling (WDT) product.

resourceDataFragment.description: The resourceData fragment to use for newly activated WDT Model File provider.

windowTitle.description: The string to display in the Window title when the WDT Model Builder is active.

modelTemplate.description: Read-only JS object containing YAML strings associated with WRC-CBE supported templates, for new WDT Model content.

readonly.description: Determines whether the WDT Model Builder operates in read-only mode or not.

createProvider.description: Creates WDT Model File provider using provider parameter.

params.description: A name of description to associate with the WDT Model File provider.
params.name: name

params.description: The contents of the .json or .yml file associated with the EDT Model file.
params.name: fileContents

deactivateProvider.description: Deactivates a previously activated WDT Model File provider.

params.description: The previously activated WDT Model File provider.
params.name: dataProvider

providerActivated.description: Triggered when WDT Model File provider has been activated with the WRC-CBE.

value.description: The WDT Model File provider populated with data received from the WRC-CBE.

providerDeactivated.description: Triggered when WDT Model File provider has been deactivated with the WRC-CBE.

value.description: The WDT Model File provider populated with data received from the WRC-CBE.

changesAutoDownloaded.description: Triggered when changes have been downloaded from the WRC-CBE, for the active WDT Model File provider.

value.description: The WDT Model File provider populated with data received from the WRC-CBE.
